content:
SystemNodeRepairAction SystemNodeRepairAction Enum

In this Article

Edit

Specifies node repair actions for which the system has a built-in executor.

This type supports the Service Fabric platform; it is not meant to be used directly from your code.

Syntax

Declaration

public enum SystemNodeRepairActionPublic Enum SystemNodeRepairAction

Fields

FullReimage
FullReimage

Reimages all disk volumes of the target nodes, destroying all data stored on the nodes.
Reboot
Reboot

Reboots the OS of the target nodes.
ReimageOS
ReimageOS

Reimages the OS volume of the target nodes.

Details

Namespace

System.Fabric.Repair

Assembly

System.Fabric.dll
